name: Catraveler
description: This game was made by Galse22 and JMCD for the Secret Santa Jam 2022 with a little extra art help by VuVuu Inc. It was made for thedavestroyer and incorporates several things of his life/characters he likes and even stars the main character as his cat. Margo, Dave's cat, has to help Dave himself fix a time machine by completing several mini-quests that involve fiction characters Dave likes.
